ruleset.name: Apex Code Style Rules
ruleset.description: Custom rules for Apex code style and formatting

rule.name: MapInitializationMustBeMultiLine
rule.message: Map initializations with 2 or more entries must be formatted with each entry on its own line
rule.description: Map initializations with 2 or more entries must be formatted with each entry on its own line. Single entry maps can be on a single line.
